name: CozySoundsforSleep
0:
”Alexa open cozy sounds”
”Alexa ask cozy sounds to play for 30 minutes”
”Alexa stop”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cozy sounds
des: Ready for bed? Grab your mug of hot chocolate, sit by the fire, or just turn this skill on to set a cozy ambient soundscape for sleep. Get started by saying, 'Alexa, open Cozy Sounds,' and enjoy a 30-minute session of sound. It's an excellent feature to use during sleep, for deep relaxation, meditation practices, or to help concentrate on your tasks.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
